name: doji
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool barpatterns.
Tool description: Screener for stock candlestick patterns & indicator signals. 
Screening 21 candlestick patterns & 6 indicator signals (supertrend, macd, rsi)
API description: Fetches a list of stocks having a Doji signal from the specified page using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

page.description: The page number to fetch the Doji signal stocks from. Defaults to 1.
